author: Joy Salas
comment: Don't get me wrong, I love the app. I used it on my iPod a couple years back. But when I tried to download it again on my Nexus 6p, it won't open. No matter how many times I try reopen or send feedback, nothing has worked. Quite disappointed because i don't like any other countdown app as much as I like this one

It wont open on the Galaxy S7. Worked fine on my iPhone SE, but absolutely refuses to open on my Galaxy & theres nothing I've been able to do to fix it. Based on reviews, its seems as though most newer phone models have this issue. I loved this app on older phones, especially the widget feature, so I really hope they fix it for new phones.

author: Anne Genevieve
comment: Love this app!  ...BUT since I upgraded to a newer phone, it won't open. It says it stopped and sends a crash report. Worked on S5 and S6, but doesn't on S8. The app info says it hasn't been udated since Nov 2016, which is likely why this is happening for everyone with newer versions of phones. Please fix this! I really liked this app.

author: Andrea Baker
comment: I don't actually hate this app, the only reason I am giving it one star is because it will not open on my Pixel. I can't review the app until this is fixed. I would like to try it out if this issue gets resolved. My hope is to give it a better review in the near future. In the meantime, sadly I will have to download a different app.

author: Tiffany Marrott
comment: I actually love this app, and I think the design is perfect and simple. However, I can't open it anymore. It keeps crashing. This has been the case for weeks. I've tried uninstalling, reinstalling, updating my phone, restarting my phone, opening the app from the widget... nothing works. I can't seem to find support contact info, so sadly I have to uninstall.

author: Daniel Kubus
comment: Too plain and boring. It does not run smoothly. The broken English makes this experience feel sloppy or apathetic. I love that it counts both up and down; I love that versatility, although I don't have need of it. Also, this app crashes too often. I have had it for five minutes and have managed to crash it about eight times.

author: Gianna
comment: Free version doesn't include a widget, which is what I was looking for. Also doesn't allow me to see the upgraded version  (says it can't find the info). Wish it had more backgrounds to choose from or let you select photos from the internet or from social media. Found a better app and uninstalled this one.

author: Anshuman Chatterjee
comment: Horrible Application... I use a Motorola G4 Plus but I can't even get the app to start. No matter how much I try, all I get is, "the application stopped working." Any solution except reinstallation is welcome.

I had this app on n old phone and one of the first I installed on 5th new one. However, it has yet to work!! I get a restart message and immediately a close app message. Sending feedback falls on deaf ears!

author: Jessica Jones
comment: Love this app. It's the only good one on play store. I've recently purchased the galaxy s8 and when I click on the app it will not let me use it. I've never had a problem with that not even on my old phone. I hope I can get it to work soon..

I had the app for a few days and then after a while it wouldn't let me on! I tried deleting the app and then trying to get in once again but failed to do so. Don't get me wrong , the app is great when you an acctually go onto it and create dates but can be a pain when you can't get back into it. After a few more tries the app wouldn't let me on.

author: Penny Wosar
comment: I liked this app on my galaxy S5. I upgraded to the galaxy S8 and it crashes every time. Fix the bug and I will give you 5 stars. I like how I can toggle between days and years/days on the countdown. Can't find another app that does that. Can't use this one anymore so I have to find another.

author: nur ain
comment: the date i set to my anniversary on 2013 but after i pushed that done button it saved on 2017. i cant edit repeat to others than none or it will change the date after i saved it. i've tried to edit but still the same. its a good apps btw but please fix ASAP this so i can use it :((

author: Daryl Cote
comment: I had this app on my Samsung S5 for a long time & loved it, but just upgraded to an S7 Edge & like everyone else, now cannot even open the app. Crashes immediately before opening. Uninstall/reinstall did not fix the issue. Have now permanently uninstalled.

author: Dennis Gill
comment: Got the free version and like it but the advertising is a bit annoying. Now i can remember anniversaries,  how many day's until our holiday is due and not to forget xmas. I can even tell people how many day's i been with my partner. Pretty cool indeed.

author: Neki Nilla
comment: Edit: The app doesn't work on my new phone  (Samsung galaxy s7).  The free version is good enough for your basic count down needs, if you want to customize or have unlimited countdowns, you have to pay. But it is a very beautiful app.

author: Kent Bode
comment: App refuses to load. Crashes immediately. I wish it would work though, because it looks like a beautifully crafted app. Please fix, and I will update my review! Google Pixel XL running Android 8.0.0

author: Leah Duncan
comment: Most people here are rating 5 stars to get free content. Otherwise you have to pay for the ad-free version, and again for the backgrounds. Shonky. Also, can no longer even use the free version because it crashes on my Pixel.
title: Most of the 5 star ratings are fake. Also crashes on Pixel

author: Amanda Dickson
comment: Great app for counting down to special events. The only thing I don't like are the ads. I tried to upgrade hoping the apps would disappear for a small fee, but I keep getting an error message. What's up with that?

author: Jessi West
comment: Broke my phone so I'm trying to log in with a different device. It say's I cant log in with Facebook which is the account I used. Now I have no access to important dates. I love this app, but now I have to rate it a 1 (if I could, a 0) because it won't let me access my account/dates.

author: Lovelydestruction
comment: it teases "upgrade to full version" which leads to "item not found". This rankles me. Why even bother with such a beautiful presentation when an ugly ad mars the whole thing?
title: I actually like the app BUT

author: Josie Feliciano-Cintron
comment: Love this app, use it all the time and helps me a lot. Update:5/7/17 - This app suddenly doesnt work, when I click to load the app it closes the app for no reason.  Uninstalled and installed again, same thing.  Sucks.

author: Caitlin Papin
comment: I downloaded it so I could have multiple active countdown clocks. I never even got to open the app because it just kept giving me the "app not responding" pop up. Will not recommend.

author: Mike Slater
comment: I installed the app but I keep getting a dialog box when I try to open it saying the app keeps shutting down. It will not open. Junk app. How can it be rated 4.8 when it won't even open? I'd give it a zero but one is the lowest I can give it.

author: Kellie Franklin
comment: Don't know if I hate it or not. Have a Samsung s7. Have installed, uninstalled, reinstalled, & am now about to uninstall for good. Have yet to open the app because it just continues to crash!!

author: Carl Kessler
comment: STILL stuck.  I want to add more days and get rid of the ads, but there's no full version in the store.  I have it five stars in order to unlock a few more days, but now even that's topped out.
title: Where's the full version?

author: Doc Jacobs
comment: Downloaded it and immediately there was a pop up stating that an app error occured and had to restart. It did it twice. I closed the app and tried to start it up and same "error" occured. Instant uninstall! I knew a 4.7 star rating was too good to be true...

author: Orlando Williams
comment: The app works fine and I love the fact that I can import my own background. However not being able to get the FULL VERSION, thus getting rid of the ads is a bummer.

author: Dan Comber
comment: 5 star reviews are obviously FAKE. Nobody writes anything, just gives 5 stars... Just Installed on Galaxy S8 and it crashes trying to open!!! Uninstalling and reporting fraudulent rating.
I used to love this app but now I can't used it on my new phone coz the application wouldn't open. Pretty sad that I have to find a new apps again. Please fix this issue asap!

author: Rachel Shouler
comment: I used to really like this app but now it won't even open on my S7. I've tried reinstalling but no luck. Disappointing.

author: Joan O.
comment: How did this app get high ratings?! Every time I try to open it, the app crashes and stops working.

author: Alastair Palm
comment: Just read another review and realised I had to look for the widget to see countdown on desktop.  Maybe, an option to make a shortcut to desktop with countdown visible?    Good app otherwise.
title: No bad

author: Tara Lane
comment: It literally has not let me open it once. Every single time I tried it crashed. Don't know what the issue is but hopefully y'all can fix it cause I would really love to be able to use it. :)

author: J Herwick
comment: Loved it when it worked.  Since the update to fix bugs it stopped working on my s7 edge and doesn't work on the note 8 either.  If they fix it I would rate 5 stars.

author: Crissie Burdette
comment: Terribly frustrating app! The app wouldn't even open, it kept crashing! So glad I didn't buy the paid version. Uninstalling!

author: Kali Mathews
comment: Wouldn't even let me open the app at all without it saying the app had stopped. Every time I'd press the restart app button it'd tell me to close out of the app. After trying to open the app multiple times and it failing to do so I've decided to delete the app and find a different one.

author: Crystal Cockrell
comment: I've heard great things about this but every time I try to open it, it says that it's stopped working.. I tried and retried but it didn't work... but I really like it and wish i could use it...

author: Zhen Xie
comment: I like the functionality of the app! just a few issues: 1. the landing page takes too long  2. this is supposed to be a simple app, why it is so big 45.50 MB?

author: Anita S
comment: I had no issue on my Galaxy S6 Edge, switched to Google Pixel and I can't even open the app. Kind of disappointed. I used to love the countdown aspect of the app but I wish it would work.
